name: anthurium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical plant with red, white, purple, or pink flowers, that is often used as a houseplant (= a plant grown in a container inside a house): Anthuriums, or flamingo flowers as they are sometimes called, are striking plants that make a statement in a room. Because they originate from tropical regions, anthuriums need plenty of heat and sunlight if they are to flourish. Synonym
flamingo flower
More examplesFewer examplesThe island is a riot of colour with anthuriums, orchids, magnolias, and oleanders all growing in large numbers in the wild.The colourful flowers of anthuriums are actually modified leaves.
